sentences.en: Herbivore man is a dandy metrosexual with an abhorrence of martial arts.
sentences.cn: 食草男是时髦的都市美男,厌恶武术.

sentences.en: I only eat vegetables (scientists call me a herbivore) -- almost always leaves from the tops of trees.
sentences.cn: 我只吃蔬菜(科学家称我为草食动物)—几乎常常是树梢的叶子。

sentences.en: Kangaroo is a herbivore, eating a variety of plants, fungi and some food.
sentences.cn: 袋鼠是食草动物，吃多种植物，有的还吃真菌类。

sentences.en: Most herbivore teeth are grinders, canines are usually absent.
sentences.cn: 食草动物的牙齿大部分是臼齿，通常没有犬齿。

sentences.en: Some examples of heavy herbivore pressure may help appreciation of the possible brevity of the selection process .
sentences.cn: 植食动物强大压力的一些事例可以帮助我们对选择过程的简略性有所了解。

sentences.en: The meat of the herbivore is, in comparison, far more edible , smellwise.
sentences.cn: 相对地，食草动物的肉闻起来要好些，更易食用。

sentences.en: You probably would call me a vegetarian. But scientists call me a herbivore because I only eat leaves, grass and other plants.
sentences.cn: 可能你会说我是素食者，但科学家称我为草食动物，因为我只吃叶子、草和其它植物。

trans.tran_en: an animal that only eats plants
